name: @mmtypes/common-test
keywords: common typescript types, utility types, types library, object entries, Object.entries, ObjectEntries
author: Tihomir Trifonov

scripts.git:confirm-add-commit: node ./scripts/confirm.js "Uncommitted changes found. Executing 'git add -A && git commit' before debug." && npm run git:add:commit
scripts.clean:bundle: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:docs
scripts.lint:debug:diff: echo "Press q to exit diff" && git diff
scripts.lint:debug:prettier: npm run format:debug && npm run lint:debug:diff
scripts.lint:debug:write:diff:stash:drop: npm run lint:debug:prettier && npm run git:stash:drop || echo 'No differences or debug failed.'
scripts.lint:debug: (npm run git:commit-ok || npm run git:confirm-add-commit) && npm run lint:debug:write:diff:stash:drop || echo 'Debug failed'
scripts.build:bundle: npm run build:types && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:clean-bundle: npm run clean:bundle && npm run build:bundle
scripts.build: npm run format && npm run build:clean-bundle
